header: Judgment on the King of Tyre

verse: Ezekiel, son of man, tell the king of Tyre that I am saying:

header: A Funeral Song for the King of Tyre

verse: Ezekiel, son of man, sing a funeral song for the king of Tyre and tell him I am saying:

header: Judgment on Sidon and Peace for Israel

verse: Ezekiel, son of man, condemn the city of Sidon
